story:
English version


Milioni di bambini e  ragazzi in Italia e nel mondo non possono camminare perché colpiti da malattia  o per una lesione del sistema nervoso di natura congenita o acquisita, come paralisi cerebrali infantili,traumi cranici,infarti, tumori cerebrali, lesioni spinali, patologie neuromuscolari.

Quando una di queste lesioni si verifica è necessario avviare un programma di recupero che consenta di tornare a camminare.

CHI SIAMO

Siamo un gruppo di ricercatori del Laboratorio di Analisi del Movimento e Robotica (MarLab) dell’Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù e ci occupiamo da anni di neonati, bambini e adolescenti che abbiano subito una lesione cerebrale o spinale. Siamo costantemente impegnati ad elaborare progetti di ricerca che cerchino di adattare le tecnologie esistenti per gli adulti alle esigenze di bambini. Quando questo non è possibile cerchiamo delle soluzioni completamente nuove. 

 Qui abbiamo sviluppato sistemi robotici ad alta tecnologia per la riabilitazione ed il recupero funzionale dei bambini con malattie del cervello e/o del midollo spinale.

COSA VOGLIAMO FARE.

Vogliamo sviluppare un nuovo modello di esoscheletro per l’anca e il bacino che consenta a questi bambini di camminare di nuovo.
Un esoscheletro è un robot in grado di supportare il movimento, caratterizzato da un insieme di sensori e da un sistema di controllo computerizzato che i giovani pazienti potranno “indossare” per recuperare le perdute facoltà motorie.


Quello che vogliamo creare è un modello mai realizzato prima in Italia e nel mondo che supererà i sistemi ad oggi esistenti in quanto:

  • Potrà essere applicato a tutti i bambini  di età superiore ai 2 anni
  •  Consentirà una personalizzazione dell’ortesi ai fini del recupero delle facoltà motorie oggi difficilmente attuabile, in quanto i robot esistenti devono essere sostituiti con la crescita del bambino. Questo consentirà di ridurre i tempi di recupero del cammino.
  •  I pazienti potranno disporre di uno strumento più piccolo e quindi meno ingombrante degli esoscheletri attuali, che potrà essere usato sia in ambiente ospedaliero che a domicilio e garantire maggiore autonomia di movimento ai piccoli.

PERCHÉ CI SERVE IL TUO AIUTO.

Il nostro progetto prevede 4 distinte fasi.

Per poter iniziare a sviluppare il prototipo dell’esoscheletro abbiamo bisogno di 40.000 euro, la cifra minima indispensabile per dare il via alla PRIMA FASE  e cioè la progettazione meccanica ed elettronica del modello.

Il tuo contributo pertanto è vitale. Senza di esso la progettazione non potrebbe iniziare.

FASI PROGETTUALI:



Con il nuovo modello robotico di anca e bacino intendiamo proseguire la linea di ricerca fino ad oggi portato avanti dal nostro Laboratorio e creare un modello che superi i limiti dei sistemi passivi oggi esistenti. Per sistemi passivi si intendono quei sistemi che utilizzano leve, carrucole, molle, o altri elementi elastici, ma non utilizzano motori. I sistemi passivi utilizzano la propulsività di chi li indossa, non consentendo,tuttavia un adattamento ai progressi del paziente.

 Quelli attivi utilizzano, invece, la propulsività dei motori che ne sono parte integrante. I robot di questa categoria possono essere programmati in modo da modificare l’interazione con il bambino per incrementare le capacità di recupero della funzione motoria.


SOSTENENDO  IL NOSTRO PROGETTO NON AIUTI SOLO IL LAVORO DI NOI RICERCATORI, MA  DONI  A TANTI BAMBINI UNA SPERANZA DI CAMMINARE DI NUOVO.
           

COSA E'IL CROWDFUNDING?

Crowdfunding, significa letteralemente ‘finanziamento dalla folla’, è un processo di finanziamento collettivo, tramite cui più persone contribuiscono con somme di denaro di varia entità a un progetto o ad un’iniziativa in cui credono e di cui si fanno sostenitori

E’ per questo che abbiamo scelto questo strumento, perché crediamo fortemente che la ricerca pediatrica debba diventare un momento di condivisione e patrimonio di tutti, non solo al momento della produzione dei risultati tangibili, ma sin dall’inizio, quando l’idea rivoluzionaria è nella mente del ricercatore. Crowdfunding significa che “tutti insieme possiamo fare la differenza” e garantire ai nostri bambini di camminare di nuovo.


COME PUOI AIUTARCI.

"DAI GAMBE" AL NOSTRO PROGETTO

Ci sono molti modi per sostenerci. La cosa più diretta? Scegli che importo puoi offrire e non pensare che pochi euro non facciano la differenza. Per ringraziarti abbiamo creato delle “ricompense” che saranno il segno tangibile della tua partecipazione. Guarda nella colonna a destra e scegli la tua. Puoi anche decidere fare l’offerta che preferisci, indicando anche che non vuoi ricevere nulla in cambio. Inserisci la tua e-mail e effettua la donazione tramite Paypal. 

Per maggiori informazioni su come donare collegati al sito www.donaora.it

"DAI VOCE" AL NOSTRO PROGETTO

Un altro modo per aiutarci è diffondere conoscenza:parlane a tutti. Se il progetto ti piace e ti convince, raccontalo. Usa i pulsanti in alto sotto il video di presentazione e condividilo con amici, parenti e conoscenti, tramite e-mail, facebook, twitter.È un modo semplice e diretto di moltiplicare il valore della nostra offerta


L'OSPEDALE PEDIATRICO BAMBINO GESU'.

L’Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù, nato nel 1869, è proprietà della Santa Sede e opera del Santo Padre. E’ riconosciuto come il più grande Policlinico e Centro di ricerca pediatrico in Europa. E’ una delle più importanti strutture sanitarie polispecialistiche e uno dei tre Istituti pediatrici di ricovero e cura a carattere scientifico d’Italia che, nel corso degli anni, ha sviluppato un’attività scientifica internazionalmente riconosciuta.

Si tratta del più grande Ospedale Pediatrico in Europa ad elevata complessità in termini di numero di ricoveri e di prestazioni specialistiche, ed è inoltre l’unico polo europeo in grado dirispondere a tutte le esigenze trapiantologiche in età pediatrica.

607 -posti letto -40 specialità- 27.000 ricoveri -83.000accessi in Day Hospital 352.000accessi ambulatoriali -1.139.450prestazioni ambulatoriali- 71.000 accessi al dipartimento di emergenza-  25.000 interventi chirurgici- 247 trapianti cardiaci e cuore/polmone dal 1986 ad oggi 1986 ad oggi- 257 trapianti di rene dal 1993 ad oggi- 72 trapianti di fegato dal 2008 ad oggi- 140 trapianti di midollo l’anno 30-trapianti di cornea l’anno- Primo impianto di cuore artificiale permanente su un paziente in età pediatrica nel 2010 un paziente in età pediatrica nel 2010-Primo trapianto d’intestino nel 2010



    

Leggi in italiano




 



Thousands of children and adolescents in Italy and around the world can’t walk because they have an illness or injury to their central nervous system due to a congenital or acquired disorder such as cerebral palsy, traumatic brain injury, stroke, brain tumour, spinal cord injury, or neuromuscular disorder.

When children are afflicted with one of these disorders or injuries, it is necessary to start a rehabilitation program to help them walk again.


WHO WE ARE.

We are a team of researchers at the Laboratory of Movement Analysis and Robotics (MarLab) at the Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù, and for years we have been committed to caring for newborns, infants and adolescents that have a brain or spinal injury. We are actively involved in developing research initiatives that adapt existing technologies in use for adults to the needs of children. If this is not possible, we look for completely new solutions. We have developed high-tech robotic systems for the rehabilitation and recovery of motor functions in children with brain and/or spinal cord disorders.


WHAT WE’D LIKE TO DO.

We want to develop a new exoskeleton for hips and pelvis to help these kids to walk again.

An exoskeleton is a robot that supports movement and is characterised by sensors and a computerised control system that young patients can “wear” to help them recover their motor functions.

We want to design a device that has never been developed in Italy or the world before and goes beyond existing systems inasmuch as:

  • It can be used for all children under the age of two
  • The orthosis can be custom fit and adapted in order to recover motor functions that are currently difficult to attain because existing robots must be substituted as the child grows. This will reduce gait rehabilitation times.
  • Patients will be provided with a smaller device that is less bulky and therefore lighter than current exoskeletons and it can be used both inside the hospital and at home, guaranteeing improved motor functions in children.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP.

Our project consists of 4 distinct phases. 

In order to begin to develop the prototype of the exoskeleton we need t 40,000 euros, the minimum amount  to kick off the FIRST PHASE namely the mechanical and electronic design of the model. 

Your contribution is therefore vital. Without it, the design could not start.

PROJECT PHASES:



With the new model of the robotic hip and pelvis we intend to continue the line of research  carried out by our laboratory and create a model that exceeds the limits of passive systems that exist today. Passive systems are those systems that use levers, pulleys, springs, or other elastic elements, but do not use motors. Passive systems utilize propelling the wearer, not allowing an adaptation to the patient's progress. 

  The active systems use, however, the propelling of the motors which are an integral part. The robot in this category can be programmed to change the interaction with the child to increase the capacity of recovery of motor function



SUPPORT OUR PROJECT. YOU  NOT ONLY HELP OUR WORK, BUT ALSO GIVE CHILDREN HOPE TO WALK AGAIN.


WHY CROWDFUNDING.

Crowdfunding is a process of collective funding from a large number of people who make monetary contributions of various sums towards a project or initiative they believe in and become supporters.

This is the reason why we have chosen this platform. We believe that paediatric research should become a time for sharing as well as public property, not only when there are tangible results but also from the moment an innovative and revolutionary idea is in the mind of a researcher. Crowdfunding means that “we can all make a difference together” and give our children hope that they will walk again.


HOW YOU CAN HELP.

"GIVE A LEG UP" TO OUR PROJECT

There are many ways you can support us. The most direct? Donate as much as you can, even a few euros can make a big difference. As an expression of our appreciation we have created some “perks” as a tangible sign of your participation. Look at the column on your right and choose the one you prefer. You can also donate any other amount and notify us that you don’t want anything in exchange. Send us your email and make your payment via PayPal. 

For more information about supporting us go to the web page www.donaora.it 

"MAKE SOME NOISE" ABOUT OUR PROJECT

You can help spread the word about the idea by talking to people about it if you like the project and you believe in it. Share it with your friends, family and colleagues via email, Facebook, twitter, or use the share tools above the presentation video. It’s a fast and easy way to multiply the value of our initiative!


THE OSPEDALE PEDIATRICO BAMBINO GESU'.

The Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù  founded in 1869, is owned by the Holy See and is a work of the Holy Father. It is recognized as the largest children’s hospital and research center in Europe. It is one of the leading comprehensive healthcare facilities and one of the three children’s institutes for scientific research and care in Italy. Over the years it has developed many internationally recognized research activities.

It is the largest children’s hospital in Europe providing high complexity care in terms of the number of hospital stays and specialised services it offers and it is also the only European facility that can meet all the requirements for paediatric transplantation.

FACTS & FIGURES: 607 beds •40 specializations •27,000 hospitalizations •83,000 outpatient procedures •352,000 outpatient visits •1,139,450 clinic visits •71,000 emergency room accesses •25,000 surgical procedures •247 heart and heart/lung transplants from 1986 to the present •257 kidney transplants from 1993 to the present •72 liver transplants from 2008 to the present• 140 bone marrow transplants a year •30 cornea transplants a year •first permanent intrathoracic artificial heart transplant in a paediatric patient in 2010 •first intestine transplant in 2010.
story_txt:
English version
Milioni di bambini e  ragazzi in Italia e nel mondo non possono camminare perché colpiti da malattia  o per una lesione del sistema nervoso di natura congenita o acquisita, come paralisi cerebrali infantili,traumi cranici,infarti, tumori cerebrali, lesioni spinali, patologie neuromuscolari.Quando una di queste lesioni si verifica è necessario avviare un programma di recupero che consenta di tornare a camminare.CHI SIAMOSiamo un gruppo di ricercatori del Laboratorio di Analisi del Movimento e Robotica (MarLab) dell’Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù e ci occupiamo da anni di neonati, bambini e adolescenti che abbiano subito una lesione cerebrale o spinale. Siamo costantemente impegnati ad elaborare progetti di ricerca che cerchino di adattare le tecnologie esistenti per gli adulti alle esigenze di bambini. Quando questo non è possibile cerchiamo delle soluzioni completamente nuove.  Qui abbiamo sviluppato sistemi robotici ad alta tecnologia per la riabilitazione ed il recupero funzionale dei bambini con malattie del cervello e/o del midollo spinale.COSA VOGLIAMO FARE.Vogliamo sviluppare un nuovo modello di esoscheletro per l’anca e il bacino che consenta a questi bambini di camminare di nuovo.Un esoscheletro è un robot in grado di supportare il movimento, caratterizzato da un insieme di sensori e da un sistema di controllo computerizzato che i giovani pazienti potranno “indossare” per recuperare le perdute facoltà motorie.Quello che vogliamo creare è un modello mai realizzato prima in Italia e nel mondo che supererà i sistemi ad oggi esistenti in quanto:Potrà essere applicato a tutti i bambini  di età superiore ai 2 anni Consentirà una personalizzazione dell’ortesi ai fini del recupero delle facoltà motorie oggi difficilmente attuabile, in quanto i robot esistenti devono essere sostituiti con la crescita del bambino. Questo consentirà di ridurre i tempi di recupero del cammino.
 I pazienti potranno disporre di uno strumento più piccolo e quindi meno ingombrante degli esoscheletri attuali, che potrà essere usato sia in ambiente ospedaliero che a domicilio e garantire maggiore autonomia di movimento ai piccoli.
PERCHÉ CI SERVE IL TUO AIUTO.
Il nostro progetto prevede 4 distinte fasi.
Per
poter iniziare a sviluppare il prototipo dell’esoscheletro abbiamo bisogno di
40.000 euro, la cifra minima indispensabile per dare il via
alla PRIMA FASE  e cioè la progettazione meccanica ed elettronica
del modello.
Il tuo contributo pertanto è vitale. Senza di esso la progettazione non potrebbe iniziare.FASI PROGETTUALI:Con il nuovo
modello robotico di anca e bacino intendiamo proseguire la linea di
ricerca fino ad oggi portato avanti dal nostro Laboratorio e creare un modello
che superi i limiti dei sistemi passivi oggi esistenti. Per sistemi passivi si intendono
quei sistemi che utilizzano leve, carrucole, molle, o altri elementi
elastici, ma non utilizzano motori. I sistemi passivi utilizzano la propulsività di chi li
indossa, non consentendo,tuttavia un adattamento ai progressi del paziente. Quelli attivi utilizzano, invece, la propulsività dei motori che ne sono parte
integrante. I robot di questa categoria possono essere programmati in modo da modificare l’interazione con il bambino per incrementare le capacità di recupero della funzione motoria.


SOSTENENDO  IL NOSTRO PROGETTO NON AIUTI SOLO IL LAVORO DI NOI RICERCATORI, MA  DONI  A TANTI BAMBINI UNA
SPERANZA DI CAMMINARE DI NUOVO.           

COSA E'IL CROWDFUNDING?
Crowdfunding, significa letteralemente ‘finanziamento dalla folla’, è un processo di finanziamento collettivo, tramite cui più persone contribuiscono con somme di denaro di varia
entità a un progetto o ad un’iniziativa in cui credono e di cui si fanno
sostenitori
E’ per questo che abbiamo scelto questo
strumento, perché crediamo fortemente che la ricerca pediatrica debba diventare
un momento di condivisione e patrimonio di tutti, non solo al momento della
produzione dei risultati tangibili, ma sin dall’inizio, quando l’idea
rivoluzionaria è nella mente del ricercatore. Crowdfunding significa che “tutti
insieme possiamo fare la differenza” e garantire ai nostri bambini di camminare
di nuovo.

COME PUOI AIUTARCI.
"DAI GAMBE" AL NOSTRO PROGETTO
Ci sono molti modi per
sostenerci. La cosa più diretta? Scegli che importo puoi offrire e non
pensare che pochi euro non facciano la differenza. Per ringraziarti abbiamo
creato delle “ricompense” che saranno il segno tangibile della tua
partecipazione. Guarda nella colonna a destra e scegli la tua. Puoi anche
decidere fare l’offerta che preferisci, indicando anche che non vuoi ricevere
nulla in cambio. Inserisci la tua e-mail e effettua la donazione tramite Paypal. 
Per maggiori informazioni su come donare collegati al sito www.donaora.it
"DAI VOCE" AL NOSTRO PROGETTO

Un altro modo per aiutarci è diffondere conoscenza:parlane a tutti. Se il progetto ti piace
e ti convince, raccontalo. Usa i pulsanti in alto sotto il video di
presentazione e condividilo con amici, parenti e conoscenti, tramite e-mail,
facebook, twitter.È un
modo semplice e diretto di moltiplicare il valore della nostra offerta

L'OSPEDALE PEDIATRICO BAMBINO GESU'.
L’Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù, nato nel 1869, è proprietà della Santa Sede e opera del Santo Padre. E’ riconosciuto come
il più grande Policlinico e Centro di ricerca
pediatrico in Europa. E’ una delle più importanti strutture
sanitarie polispecialistiche e uno dei tre Istituti pediatrici di ricovero e
cura a carattere scientifico d’Italia che, nel corso degli anni, ha sviluppato
un’attività scientifica internazionalmente riconosciuta.
Si tratta del più grande Ospedale Pediatrico in Europa ad elevata
complessità in termini di numero di ricoveri e di prestazioni specialistiche,
ed è inoltre l’unico polo europeo in grado dirispondere a tutte le esigenze trapiantologiche
in età pediatrica. 

607 -posti letto -40 specialità- 27.000 ricoveri -83.000accessi in Day Hospital 352.000accessi ambulatoriali -1.139.450prestazioni ambulatoriali- 71.000 accessi al dipartimento di emergenza-  25.000 interventi chirurgici- 247 trapianti cardiaci e cuore/polmone
dal 1986 ad oggi 1986 ad oggi- 257 trapianti
di rene dal 1993 ad oggi- 72 trapianti
di fegato dal 2008 ad oggi- 140 trapianti
di midollo l’anno 30-trapianti
di cornea l’anno- Primo impianto
di cuore artificiale permanente su un paziente in età pediatrica nel 2010 un paziente in età pediatrica nel 2010-Primo trapianto d’intestino nel 2010

    

Leggi in italiano





 

Thousands of children and adolescents in Italy and around the world can’t
walk because they have an illness or injury to their central nervous system due
to a congenital or acquired disorder such as cerebral palsy, traumatic brain injury,
stroke, brain tumour, spinal cord injury, or neuromuscular disorder.

When children are afflicted with one of these disorders or injuries, it is
necessary to start a rehabilitation program to help them walk again.

WHO WE
ARE.
We are a team of researchers at the Laboratory
of Movement Analysis and Robotics (MarLab)
at the Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù, and for years we have
been committed to caring for newborns, infants and adolescents that have a brain
or spinal injury. We are actively involved in developing research initiatives
that adapt existing technologies in use for adults to the needs of children. If
this is not possible, we look for completely new solutions. We have developed
high-tech robotic systems for the rehabilitation and recovery of motor
functions in children with brain and/or spinal cord disorders. 

WHAT WE’D
LIKE TO DO.
We want to develop a new exoskeleton
for hips and pelvis to help these
kids to walk again.
An exoskeleton is a robot that supports movement and is characterised by
sensors and a computerised control system that young patients can “wear” to
help them recover their motor functions.
We want to design a device that has never been
developed in Italy or the world before and goes beyond existing systems inasmuch as: 

It can
     be used for all children under the age of two
The
     orthosis can be custom fit and adapted in order to recover motor functions
     that are currently difficult to attain because existing robots must be
     substituted as the child grows. This will reduce gait rehabilitation
     times.
Patients
     will be provided with a smaller device that is less bulky and therefore lighter
     than current exoskeletons and it can be used both inside the hospital and
     at home, guaranteeing improved motor functions in children.


WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP.












Our project consists of 4 distinct phases. In order to begin to develop the prototype of the exoskeleton we need t 40,000 euros, the minimum amount  to kick off the FIRST PHASE namely the mechanical and electronic design of the model. Your contribution is therefore vital. Without it, the design could not start.


PROJECT PHASES:




With the new model of the robotic hip and pelvis we intend to continue the line of research  carried out by our laboratory and create a model that exceeds the limits of passive systems that exist today. Passive systems are those systems that use levers, pulleys, springs, or other elastic elements, but do not use motors. Passive systems utilize propelling the wearer, not allowing an adaptation to the patient's progress. 
  The active systems use, however, the propelling of the motors which are an integral part. The robot in this category can be programmed to change the interaction with the child to increase the capacity of recovery of motor function


SUPPORT OUR PROJECT. YOU  NOT ONLY HELP OUR WORK, BUT ALSO GIVE CHILDREN HOPE TO WALK AGAIN.

WHY CROWDFUNDING.
Crowdfunding is a process of collective funding from a large number of people who make
monetary contributions of various sums towards a project or initiative they
believe in and become supporters.
This is the reason why we have chosen this platform. We believe that
paediatric research should become a time for sharing as well as public
property, not only when there are tangible results but also from the moment an
innovative and revolutionary idea is in the mind of a researcher. Crowdfunding
means that “we can all make a difference together” and give our children hope
that they will walk again.


HOW YOU
CAN HELP.
"GIVE A LEG UP" TO OUR PROJECT
There are many ways you can support us. The most direct? Donate as much as you can, even a few euros can
make a big difference. As an expression of our appreciation we have created
some “perks” as a tangible sign of your participation. Look at the column on
your right and choose the one you prefer. You can also donate any other amount
and notify us that you don’t want anything in exchange. Send us your email and
make your payment via PayPal. 
For more information about supporting us go to the web page www.donaora.it 

"MAKE SOME NOISE" ABOUT OUR PROJECT
You can help spread the word about the idea by talking to people about it if you like the
project and you believe in it. Share it with your friends, family and
colleagues via email, Facebook, twitter, or use the share tools above the
presentation video. It’s a fast and easy way to multiply the value of our initiative!

THE OSPEDALE PEDIATRICO BAMBINO GESU'.
The Ospedale Pediatrico Bambino Gesù  founded in 1869, is owned by the Holy See and is a
work of the Holy Father. It is recognized as the largest children’s
hospital and research center in Europe. It is one of the leading comprehensive healthcare facilities and one of
the three children’s institutes for scientific research and care in Italy. Over
the years it has developed many internationally recognized research activities.

It is the largest children’s hospital in Europe providing high complexity
care in terms of the number of hospital stays and specialised services it
offers and it is also the only European facility that can meet all the
requirements for paediatric transplantation.
FACTS & FIGURES: 607 beds •40 specializations •27,000 hospitalizations •83,000 outpatient procedures •352,000 outpatient visits •1,139,450 clinic visits •71,000 emergency room accesses •25,000 surgical procedures •247 heart and heart/lung transplants from 1986 to the present •257 kidney transplants from 1993 to the present •72 liver transplants from 2008 to the present• 140 bone
marrow transplants a year •30 cornea transplants a year •first permanent intrathoracic artificial heart transplant
in a paediatric patient in 2010 •first intestine transplant in 2010.

story:
Voor Nederlands, klik hier

Introducing the Point of Sale that works seamlessly with your existing e-commerce software such as Magento, WooCommerce and SEOshop.



Businesses with online stores increasingly have started opening brick-and-mortar stores, and vice-versa. However, most are stuck in a world where they have to use a POS for their 'offline' store(s) that is completely disconnected from their ‘online’ store. Seamless multi-channel retail is no longer a luxury, but increasingly a necessity.

We solve this pain for retailers by offering a POS that works directly with their existing e-commerce sites. 


No more hassles managing products on two systems and purchasing add-ons to work separately online and offline. By using our POS which works with your existing e-commerce sites, you save time and money. You don't have to manage your inventory on 2 systems or manually try to reconcile accounting from your in-store and online sales. Instead, you see combined business performance in one place and lower your accounting and administration fees in the process. 

We have already built our POS to work with Magento, SEOShop and Spree Commerce and are looking to built it on other e-commerce platforms such as WooCommerce, PrestaShop and BigCommerce. The reasons for building it on existing e-commerce platforms are two-fold:

  1. All eCommerce platforms we build upon are very stable and have huge communities of developers maintaining and correcting problems. By building on top of these platforms, you are assured of a properly functioning, stable, reliable POS from day 1.
  2. You already use your eCommerce system. Why force you to learn a totally new system, and why go through the hassle of moving your products from one to another?




Get one of our Perks and take advantage of unique discounts!

The perks in this campaign give you a 30% to 55% discount on the premium subscription rates depending on the duration of subscription you choose. 

We have given below the normal pricing for our Cash Register so you know what you are getting.



We have spent the past few months researching, developing, testing and continuously improving CashOrCard POS. We have developed a world-class POS alongside real business owners, and we already have a ready-to-release product.

But now we need your help! Your support will help us add more e-commerce platforms and lots of new features (table layouts, mobile ordering, personnel management etc...) over the coming months.


We know we have built a great product and stand behind our work. If you are not happy with our Cash Register after using it for 30 days, then request a refund and we will give you your contribution back.


SAVE even more!



For every person who comes here via your link and makes a contribution, we will give you a €10 refund at the end of the campaign, up to the amount of your contribution.

How it works: Pledge for at least a 6 months subscription to get your personal tracking URL. Then, use the share buttons or copy your unique URL below the video at the top of this page to spread the word about CashOrCard POS and start collecting refunds! Post it to your blog, share it on Facebook, BuzzFeed, Twitter, or simply tell your friends! Make sure you are logged in to IndieGogo and use your personal URL for sharing so your referrals are registered!

Example: Pledge for the 1 year Subscription. Then, get 5 of your friends to also contribute. We will credit you €10 for each additional contributor you bring on. After your contribution, we send you an email with instructions on how to track your progress.

Our most successful ambassadors get extra rewards. These rewards are also available for those who didn't yet order .

•  Top 1 campaigner gets one free Google Nexus 10 tablet.

•  Top 50 campaigners each get an additional 6 months of premium subscription.

The number of successful referrals at the end of the campaign determines your final ranking. 


We will provide all the required hardware you need to set up the Cash Register in your store at great prices. When setting up your account with us, we will discuss your specific requirements and will ship the hardware you need to you.

We only work with high quality products from leading providers of hardware such as:

Apple & Samsung     Tablets
Star Micronics            WiFi printer & cash drawer
Socket Mobile            Barcode scanner
Adyen                           Payments terminal


I do not have a webstore, is CashOrCard POS still the right product for me?  Yes absolutely! Seamlessly integrated eCommerce is a feature of CashOrCard POS, but our software is designed to run your store operations even if you do not have an eCommerce site. We will provide you with our own CashOrCard engine to manage your store. The beautiful design and easy back office mean it is definitely more than just a useful product for your business - it's a necessity.

I have a restaurant and I need a floor map. We are building features for restaurants, bars, hotel and hairdressers at the moment. Features include open orders for tables and floor maps. We expect to launch these early next year.

How can I know that you will deliver for sure?  Unlike most crowdfunding campaigns, we already have a product ready to go and are looking to build in support for more platforms. At the moment, we are already ready with Magento, SpreeCommerce and SEOshop.

We're open to your questions and ideas! Contact us at support@cashorcardpos.com


Maybe you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help :)
•  Use the tools at Indiegogo to share this campaign on social media.
•  Share this campaign on Facebook
•  Tweet it
•  Tell everyone you know to tell everyone they know
•  Blog it
•  Shout it out from the rooftops


THANK YOU! :)


NEDERLANDS

CashOrCard POS, het offline kassasysteem dat naadloos aansluit op de e-commercesoftware van webshops. 


Nu veel ondernemingen zich zowel offline als online begeven, stuiten ze vaak op het probleem hoe beide bedrijfsvoeringen eenvoudig samen zijn te voegen in één systeem.  Wij lossen dit op met ons kassasysteem app (voor tablets)  waarmee je snel en simpel de e-commerce software kan koppelen aan jouw fysieke kassa.

Geen gedoe meer met dubbele werkzaamheden en aparte hulpmodules voor de verschillende systemen.
In plaats van aparte voorraadbeheer programma's, boekhouding voor zowel offline als online, verschillende verkoopresultaten, kan je nu alles vanuit een punt makkelijk en overzichtelijk managen. Op termijn levert de tijdwinst ook kostenverlaging op in de boekhouding.

Met CashOrCard POS gekoppeld aan je e-commerce website, bespaar je tijd en geld.

CashOrCard POS is te koppelen aan Magento, SEOshop en Spree Commerce. Op korte termijn kan je ook toevoeging van Woocommerce, Prestashop en BigCommerce verwachten.

De twee hoofdzakelijke redenen dat wij CashOrCard POS gebouwd hebben op bestaande e-commerce platformen zijn:
1. Alle te koppelen e-commerce platformen zijn betrouwbaar en hebben een sterke (online) gemeenschap voor ontwikkelaars. De platformen worden continue doorontwikkeld door experts. En daardoor kan je rekenen op een vertrouwd en stabiel kassasysteem.
2. Je gebruikt al een e-commerce platform. Waarom een totaal nieuw systeem opnieuw en alle artikelen voor de 2e keer invoeren als dit onnodig is?



Pak je voordeel en maak gebruik van deze eenmalige unieke aanbiedingen!

De aanbiedingen (Perks) lopen op tot 55%! De hoogte van de korting is afhankelijk van de gekozen tijdsduur van het Premium Customer Support abonnement.
Als je kiest voor de aanbieding van 2 jaar dan betaal je maandelijks minder dan €24 ipv de standaardprijs van €49 per maand. 

Onderstaand zie je een overzicht wat wij gratis aanbieden en wat het Premium aanbod inhoudt.


Afgelopen maanden hebben we CashOrCard POS ontwikkelt en uitvoerig getest. Samen met winkeliers hebben we tijdens de operationele tests de spreekwoordelijke laatste puntjes op de i gezet.

Maar we hebben nu je hulp nodig. Me jouw aankoop van een van de aanbiedingen kunnen we sneller nog meer e-commerce platformen toevoegen aan CashOrCard POS.


We garanderen dat we een top product aanbieden. Mocht je toch ontevreden zijn over ons kassasysteem binnen de eerste 30 dagen van je abonnement, dan geven we je geld terug.


Wil jij nog meer korting? Wordt CashOrCard POS Ambassadeur!
Voor iedere persoon die jij aandraagt (dmv link delen) en hij/zij een van onze 'Perks’ koopt (minimale besteding moet €199 zijn) krijg je €10 korting.
Voorbeeld:
Koop de Perk '6 month subscription’ en ontvang je eigen persoonlijke tracking URL. Verspreid de link aan vrienden, bekenden, izakelijke relaties en ontvang voor elke nieuwe aankoop via jouw link €10 extra korting. 
De meest succesvolle ambassadeur ontvangt 1 gratis Nexus 10 tablet
Top 50 ambassadeurs krijgen 6 maanden gratis Premium abonnement t.w.v. €294 


Onze zijn hardware partners zijn gerenommeerde merken:
Apple & Samsung     Tablets
Star Micronics            WiFi printer & cash drawer
Socket Mobile            Barcode scanner
Adyen                           Payments terminal
Neem gerust contact met ons op voor persoonlijk advies wat de beste opstelling voor uw zaak is. We helpen u graag en kunt de hardware via ons tegen zeer voordelige prijzen kopen.


Ik heb geen webshop, kan ik toch jullie app voor mijn onderneming gebruiken?
Absoluut! Wij leveren ook een eigen backoffice voor alleen fysieke winkels die eenvoudig in gebruik is. Mocht je in de toekomst ook je producten online willen aanbieden dan heb je al de oplossing om zowel online als offline vanuit een systeem te ondernemen. 


Ik heb een restaurant, is de app ook voor de horeca geschikt?
Op korte termijn lanceren wij verschillende modules voor de horeca , geavanceerd online reserveringssysteem voor de oa de hotellerie en verschillende toepassingen specifiek voor de wellness industrie. 


Hoe kan ik er zeker van zijn dat jullie leveren?
Ons product is klaar.  E-commerce platformen die al  gekoppeld kunnen worden zijn Magento, Spree Commerce en SEOshop.
Met de investeringen die we via Indiegogo binnenhalen kunnen we versnellen met het toevoegen van nieuwe e-commerce platformen.
Neem met ons contact op voor vragen, opmerkingen en suggesties support@cashorcardpos.com


  • Klik en deel onze boodschap mbv een van de Social Media buttons op deze Indiegogo pagina.
  • Like en volg ons. Facebook of tweet over @cashorcardpos of facebook.com/cashorcardpos
  • Blog over de eenvoudige koppeling tussen de fysieke en offline winkel met CashOrCard
  • Gooi het raam open en schreeuw het uit ;)

ONWIJS BEDANKT!

number of successful referrals at the end of the campaign determines your final
ranking. 



We will provide all the required hardware you need to set up the Cash Register in your store at great prices. When setting up your account with us, we will discuss your specific requirements and will ship the hardware you need to you.
We only work with high quality products from leading providers of hardware such as:
Apple & Samsung     TabletsStar Micronics            WiFi printer & cash drawerSocket Mobile            Barcode scannerAdyen                           Payments terminal





I do not have a webstore, is CashOrCard POS still
the right product for me?  Yes absolutely! Seamlessly integrated eCommerce is a feature of CashOrCard POS, but our software is designed to run your store operations even if you do not have an eCommerce site. We will provide you with our own CashOrCard engine to manage your store. The beautiful design and easy back office mean it is definitely more than just a useful product for your business - it's a necessity.
I have a restaurant and I need a floor map. We are building features for restaurants, bars, hotel and hairdressers at the moment. Features include open orders for tables and floor maps. We
expect to launch these early next year.
How can I know that you will deliver for sure?  Unlike most crowdfunding campaigns, we already
have a product ready to go and are looking to build in support for more platforms. At the moment, we are already ready with Magento, SpreeCommerce and SEOshop.
We're open to your questions and ideas! Contact us
at support@cashorcardpos.com



Maybe you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you
can’t help :)• 
Use the tools at Indiegogo to share this campaign
on social media.• 
Share this campaign on Facebook• 
Tweet it• 
Tell everyone you know to tell everyone they know• 
Blog it• 
Shout it out from the rooftops



THANK YOU! :)



NEDERLANDS


CashOrCard POS,
het offline kassasysteem dat naadloos aansluit op de e-commercesoftware van
webshops. 





Nu veel
ondernemingen zich zowel offline als online begeven, stuiten ze vaak op het
probleem hoe beide
bedrijfsvoeringen eenvoudig samen zijn te voegen in één
systeem.  Wij lossen
dit op met ons kassasysteem app (voor tablets)  waarmee je snel en simpel
de e-commerce software kan koppelen aan jouw fysieke kassa.
Geen
gedoe meer met dubbele werkzaamheden en aparte hulpmodules voor de
verschillende systemen.In
plaats van aparte voorraadbeheer programma's, boekhouding voor zowel offline
als online, verschillende verkoopresultaten, kan je nu alles vanuit een punt
makkelijk en overzichtelijk managen. Op termijn levert de tijdwinst ook
kostenverlaging op in de boekhouding.
Met
CashOrCard POS gekoppeld aan je e-commerce website, bespaar je tijd en geld.

CashOrCard
POS is te koppelen aan Magento, SEOshop en Spree Commerce. Op korte termijn kan
je ook toevoeging van Woocommerce, Prestashop
en BigCommerce verwachten.
De
twee hoofdzakelijke redenen dat wij CashOrCard POS gebouwd hebben op bestaande
e-commerce platformen zijn:1.
Alle te koppelen e-commerce platformen zijn betrouwbaar en hebben een sterke
(online) gemeenschap voor ontwikkelaars. De platformen worden continue
doorontwikkeld door experts. En daardoor kan je rekenen op een vertrouwd en stabiel
kassasysteem.2.
Je gebruikt al een e-commerce platform. Waarom een totaal nieuw systeem opnieuw
en alle artikelen voor de 2e keer invoeren als dit onnodig is?






Pak je
voordeel en maak gebruik van deze eenmalige unieke aanbiedingen!
De
aanbiedingen (Perks) lopen op tot 55%! De hoogte van de korting is afhankelijk
van de gekozen tijdsduur van het Premium
Customer Support abonnement.Als je kiest voor de aanbieding van 2 jaar dan betaal je maandelijks minder dan €24 ipv de standaardprijs van €49 per maand. 
Onderstaand zie je een overzicht wat wij gratis aanbieden en wat het Premium aanbod inhoudt.





Afgelopen
maanden hebben we CashOrCard POS ontwikkelt en uitvoerig getest. Samen met
winkeliers hebben we tijdens de operationele tests de spreekwoordelijke laatste
puntjes op de i gezet.
Maar
we hebben nu je hulp nodig. Me jouw aankoop van een van de aanbiedingen kunnen
we sneller nog meer e-commerce platformen toevoegen aan CashOrCard POS.




We
garanderen dat we een top product aanbieden. Mocht je toch ontevreden zijn over
ons kassasysteem binnen de eerste 30 dagen van je abonnement, dan geven
we je geld terug.

Wil jij nog meer korting?

iedere persoon die jij aandraagt (dmv link delen) en hij/zij een van onze
'Perks’ koopt (minimale besteding moet €199 zijn) krijg je €10 korting.Voorbeeld:Koop
de Perk '6 month subscription’ en ontvang je eigen persoonlijke tracking URL.
Verspreid de link aan vrienden, bekenden, izakelijke relaties en ontvang voor
elke nieuwe aankoop via jouw link €10 extra korting. De

om zowel online als offline vanuit een systeem te ondernemen.

story:
What is Selldigi?

Selling things has always been a problem. Selldigi solves this problem & help creators by building an easy to use site to upload & sell photos, designs, ebooks, music, videos, software or any other digital product you create.

Enabling and helping artists share & sell their creations easily is our main goal with Selldigi. I hope we can reach our goal with your help.

How does Selldigi work?

  1. Upload your file, describe what you want to sell and for how much
  2. Get a short link that you can share with anyone
  3. When someone clicks on the link, they go directly to your product where they can pay in seconds.

Why it is so great?

  1. No distractions on product page. Buyers focus on your product.
  2. No setup fees. Just sign up for free.
  3. No monthly fees. Upload as many files as you want.
  4. No big cuts. Very low fees for each item sold.
  5. No waiting for review queues. Start selling immediately.
  6. No fixed pricing. Set your own price for each item.

Who is Mr. Selldigi?

I'm Gokhan Celiker from the beautiful city of Istanbul, Turkey. I've worked on technology projects for over ten years and currently have websites with millions of page views monthly. I think the best place that tells what I've worked on previously without you getting bored would be Linkedin: http://tr.linkedin.com/in/gokhanceliker

What We Need & What You Get

We need the funds to found an international company which can get an online credit card payment gateway with the lowest processing commission from a bank. Securely located high capacity servers for handling credit cards, SSL certificates, encryption, credit card fraud protection services, coding, design and marketing are also our main costs.

If we don't reach to our full funding goal, we can still build the site with another payment gateway integration such as Paypal. This is not preferred since it increases the fees and causes friction for the buyer. So please help us reach our full funding goal!

Exclusive Perks!

$1 - We Are All One - Every penny counts! You will get the right to vote on our community decisions and also be featured on our special thank you page.

$10 - Powers of Ten - If you pledge $10 or more, you will get $1 perk + be able to select 3 digital downloads from our selection.

$25 - Silver Tester - Exclusive closed beta user! You will get $1 perk + be able to choose 10 digital downloads from our selection and also be one of the first users of Selldigi.

$50 - Explosion T-shirt - Get the exclusive t-shirt that Mr. Selldigi wears while running in front of an explosion. Plus everything at $25 perk.

$100 - Awesome Hoodie - Get the exclusive Selldigi sweatshirt that you can wear with pride and be awesome. Plus everything at $25 perk.

More rewards to come!

The Gallery

We've got great artist supporters on board who will also get credit when you choose them as a reward.

Contact us if you want to join our supporting artists. We would love that!

Christian M.P. Holm

High resolution (18+ megapixel) digital downloads of great photos by Christian M.P. Holm.

 

Emre Arisev

Be the first to get exclusive download rights to Emre's original tracks.

Emre Arisev Feat. Elif - Lift Me Up

Emre Arısev - Eternity

Emre Arisev - Louder

The Impact

We want to help all artists and creators worldwide. If you contribute, you will not only be able to easily sell your digital goods online, but also help everyone on the earth to do so.

We are thrilled to work on this mission with your help!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, please share this with your friends and followers. Every share helps us reach our mission.

If you are an artist, we want to help you reach out to your fans. Please contact us to learn more.

Thanks!

 

Grade this project on ReportCrowd

story:
The Party Plate...recently featured on Anderson Live hosted by Anderson Cooper.

 

The Product

The Party Plate is a custom design of paper and plastic plates. The plates are disposable with a detachable handle in the center that houses the beverage (can, bottle, cup, etc.), which allows the guest to have a free hand to eat, drink and socialize without the common restrictions that come along with holding a plate in one hand and a drink in the other. It's not your typical paper or plastic plate;.... it's a "premium food service item" that will solve a dilemma and improve any party where there are not enough tables or chairs.

 

 Octagon Party Plate

 

Biodegradable Presidential Platter

 

How It All Started

The concept and idea came out of sheer frustration. We were attending an outdoor party with approximately 150 guests. The mosquitos were so annoying that the host had to bring the party indoors. The house quickly became very crowded. Guests were trying to juggle their plates and drinks while hugging, greeting and shaking hands. Every time we would set our drinks down to eat or greet a person, someone inadvertently took our drinks or placed another person's drink next to ours and no one could decide whose drink belong to whom.....we've all been in this situation before. We stayed after the party to help with the clean-up and poured (at least) 70 cans, bottles and glasses of half drank drinks down the drain. The next day saw the beginnings of The Party Plate.

 

The Party Plates are Great for:

  • Cocktail Parties
  • Tailgating Parties
  • Family Reunions
  • Picnics / Barbecues
  • Super Bowl (Sports) Parties
  • Buffets
  • New Year Eve Parties
  • Corporate Parties
  • Caterers & Event Planners
  • You Name A Party And The Party Plate Will Make It A Better Party!

 

The Party Plates Benefits:

  • Controls Food Portions - Saving Money
  • Saves On Wasted Drinks - No More Misplaced Drinks
  • Allows Guests To Mingle Comfortably
  • Cuts Down On Spillage
  • Improves Any Party Where There Are Not Enough Chairs or Tables
  • They're Biodegradable and Disposable
  • They Allow Product/Theme Branding - Your Name, Logo, Event
  • They Come Twenty-Four Plates To A Box
  • They're Affordable

 

The Perfect Pairing

If a person loves outdoor events and activities, the odds are that they own one or more of the 15,000,000 folding bag chairs that are in circulation in the United States. Whether it's a Tailgating Party, Concert / Movie in the Park, a Day at the Beach or whatever the activity, The Party Plate is the perfect companion to most folding bag chairs.

 

 

 

 

Instead of the drink holder in the arm of the chair just holding their water, soft drink or beer, it can now hold their entire plate & beverage. It doesn't get better than that!

 

The Party Plate Perks

Thank You Card

Inscribed LED Flashlight Keychain

 

 Party Platin' & Tailgatin' T- Shirt - Men

 

 

Party Platin' & Tailgatin' T-Shirt - Women 

 

The Party Plate T-Shirt - Men & Women

 

Box-A-Month Club - 3 Months, 6 Months, 12 Month

 Indiegogo Project Backer Plaque

 

 

 

We will host a Tailgate or Barbecue Party for you and twelve of your friends

 

Choose Your Colors

 

 Black - Cream - Gold - Silver - Clear

 

 Biodegradable White

Currently, the beverage holder insert only comes in the Clear color. Additional insert colors are coming soon.

 

About Team Party Plate

Team Party Plate - encompass over 100 years of combined business experience in the areas of manufacturing, marketing, sales and distribution. Instilled in each of us is a creative passion and the belief that the small business is truly the engine drives our country's economy.

 

Use Of Funds

The Party Plate is in the GO MODE! The technical feasibility has been proven on the engineering prototype. The balance of the engineering development program will consist of maximizing the production equipment. We need only to build the mold for production here in the United States. At present, we are having the insert manufactured in China.

We have found a manufacturer here in the United States that will manufacture our product. The cost of the mold and tooling is $41,873 and we still need funds for associated production costs, inventory, marketing and distribution.

We are looking forward to producing The Party Plate here in the Chicagoland area, realizing a dream of having our product proudly MADE IN AMERICA.

PATENT PENDING

 

Counting Down......

We only have 60 days to reach our goal. Please support us by making a contribution TODAY!

 

Please Spread The Word......

Your support and contributions are greatly appreciated and all of us at The Party Plate thank you. We still need your help. If you would spread the word to others about our Indiegogo campaign we would be truly grateful.

  • Please share this Indiegogo page with family, friends, co-workers and associates.
  • Put a link to this Indiegogo page online at various social media platforms such as Twitter, You Tube, Facebook, etc.
  • Write about us on your blog or website.

 

Risk and Challenges

Having any product made overseas exposes a company to a number of risk and challanges. Everything from quality issues, product knock-offs, shipping delays - you name it. By having The Party Plate manufactured in the United States, we are more hands on regarding all these issues and can react swiftly to remedy any problems that may arise.

story:
The Red Rabbit Studio has created the Roadside Killers Indiegogo campaign to gather support for releasing it's first set of PVC Gum figurines. All designs are created in studio and will be sold as limited run, premium products.

I'm here to seek the visionary contributions of people from all over the world. My goal here is to raise $6500.

Where are the funds used for?
All raised funds will be used to secure the materials needed to create a set of prototypes of PVC Gum collectable figurines. We have a supplier in China with the capacity to create overr 200 unique templates from the designs we make.

>>For examples of type of toys being developed follow this link.

What is your incentive to contribute?
I am proud to offer figurines and full sets depending on your level of commitment. Take a look at the perks and decide how you'd like to help.

What happens if the funding target is not met?
All funds will go towards our goal to source prototypes. If the goal is not met, we will carry over the funds and perks into a second Indiegogo campaign.

What does Roadside Killers mean?
Roadsdie Killers is the catchy brand name for The Red Rabbit Studio's line of toys.

Who am I?

The Red Rabbit Studio
Through my established studio, all design related work will be produced using professional programs and equipment required to ensure all designs meet spec for both print and quality.

Am I on social media?

Instagram
Facebook
Twitter
Pinterest

What about the figurines?

I want to make toys.

Not just any toys, but small little figurines that you'd love to play with.

I'll start from the beginning. When I was a small lad, I played with a toy called M.U.S.C.L.E. They were single coloured little figurines made from a material called PVC Gum. Originally they could be purchased in a pink-peachy colour but eventually they were available in a variety of colours from all over the rainbow.

Some of you reading this article may have also played with them, a kindred soul perhaps, wistfully losing the hours to small battles, wrestling matches and epic operas boiled down from your imagination into the world of fantasy-play. Me too, I did that.

As I grow older I often think about those days of imagination expansion and what it meant to me as a child. From my adult perspective, I have the unique position of having technically and professionally developed design skills that I use to create graphics for other peoples ideas, a job I love intensely and passionately. I have a plan to merge the imagination expansion of my youth with the reality of my adulthood.

I'm designing my own figurines modeled off of those old toys but with my own twist and flavour. 

My goal:

To provide the same sense of imagination and fantasy for anyone who wants it.

So, what do you think? Have you always wanted to make toys? Do you want to be part of an idea to create toys?

What will you contribute?

A simple gesture to help us would be to contribute $3 and pass along the campaign via your social media network. If you dig the idea at a deeper level, consider a higher level of contribution. We appreciate all the help we can get to reach our simple and modest goal of $6500.

Thank you, from one killer, to another.

JP Hilton

As I grow older I often think about those days of imagination expansion and what it meant to me as a child. From my adult perspective, I have the unique position of having technically and professionally developed design skills that I use to create graphics for other peoples ideas, a job I love intensely and passionately. I have a plan to merge the imagination expansion of my youth with the reality of my adulthood.
I'm designing my own figurines modeled off of those old toys but with my own twist and flavour. 
My goal:
To provide the same sense of imagination and fantasy for anyone who wants it.
So, what do you think? Have you always wanted to make toys? Do you want to be part of an idea to create toys?
What will you contribute?
A simple gesture to help us would be to contribute $3 and pass along the campaign via your social media network. If you dig the idea at a deeper level, consider a higher level of contribution. We appreciate all the help we can get to reach our simple and modest goal of $6500.
Thank you, from one killer, to another.
JP Hilton

story:
Beacon - a pedestrian and bicyclist friendly community

BeaconArts needs your help to fund bicycle shared-lane pavement markings ("sharrows" - (SHared ARROWS) indicate that the roadway should be shared between motorists and bicyclists) on Main Street.  Your contribution will not only help finish funding for Phase 1 of the project (sharrows on Main St.); but also show support to extend these facilities throughout Beacon.  Additional funds will support additional sharrow projects in Beacon.

Heck - the legendary rock group Queen wrote a song about riding bicycles (see below)!  Let's honor them by filling this gap and providing support for places where you can ride your bicycle safely.  If only Queen could see Beacon today...

Beacon has emerged as a destination hotspot in the Hudson Valley.  Residents and visitors frequent Main Street for the shops, restaurants, and galleries, yet there aren't adequate facilities for pedestrians and bicyclists.  Several organizations (BeaconArts and Scenic Hudson), local businesses (Peoples Bicycle, Beacon Cycles, Bank Sq. Coffeehouse, Mountain Tops, Tito Santana's, The Beacon Bagel, and the Beacon Creamery), and community members (Stowe Boyd) are working to include amenities on Main Street so all users feel safe.

Amenities for all users (pedestrians and bicyclists) have numerous benefits:

  • Safety:  Slower traffic results in fewer accidents and less severe injuries. Also, clear indication of where users should be decreases risk of conflict.  It creates a safer environment for motorists and bicyclists!
  • Revenue:  Increased foot traffic and alternative modes of transportation like bicycles results in more people stopping and frequenting local businesses.
  • Health:  News flash!  Riding a bicycle or walking burns calories.
  • Inspiration:  Beacon already has a bike and pedestrian culture.  Facilitating greater and safer bicycle networks encourages more people to get on their bicycles to get around town or beyond!
  • Environment:  Burn calories, not fossil fuels which pollute the environment.

And last but not least, it's:

  • FUN!:  Have you ever seen a person frowning on a bicycle?  No, because they have a blissful smile on their face as a gentle breeze flows through their hair.


Support = Celebrity status in Beacon

Your contribution will go directly to BeaconArts who has already paid for the sharrows.

Funding will be used to complete Phase 1:  Sharrows on Main Street.  If this campaign is successful, we will look to Phase 2:  Extending Sharrows from Main Street to the Beacon Train Station and Phase 3:  Sharrows along Tioronda Ave. (Fishkill Creek) - so stay tuned and please provide positive feedback (because you don't want bad karma).  In return for your generous support, we have several one of a kind, Beacon only rewards that will make you a celebrity in town.

  • Ever want to design your own BURRITO, SANDWICH, or SUNDAE at a restaurant and have them NAME IT AFTER YOU?  Well, here is your chance.  Through the generosity of several Main St. shops, you'll have that chance to work with the burrito experts, a bagel craftsmen, and a sundae architect to design and build your own culinary creation.
  • Other perks include a free coffee, kayak rental and tune-up from businesses voted "Best of" by Hudson Valley Magazine.
  • If we don't reach our funding goal...well, that's not going to happen because you won't let it - right?

Your support goes beyond just this project 

These sharrows were the first in Dutchess County and even for the Mid-Hudson Region.  It received support from the NYS Hudson River Valley Greenway and Dutchess County.

Beacon is a leader:  Numerous towns in the Hudson Valley took notice and have been implementing these same techniques to provide safe facilities for bicyclists and pedestrians.

Your involvement acknowledges that pedestrian and bicyclist facilities are critical to a healthy Main Street environment for residents and visitors.  In fact, your support demonstrates community support for these types of projects which helps when communities look to the state for assistance.  So, really, your contribution has a lasting impact and can potentially help leverage additional funding.

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute, no problem:

  • We just ask that you help spread the word and ring that bicycle bell for us!
  • Just use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • And don't forget to check in and support the local Beacon businesses.  Supporting businesses are listed below.

Bicycle Bicycle Bicycle.  I want to ride my Bicycle...in BEACON!

story:
Help Ada's Family


The goal of this project is to provide support and relief in an extremely stressful time for a family devastated by an unfortunate tragedy. 


Ada is a 4 year old girl who unfortunately suffered from terminal kidney failure.  While she will always be in our hopes and prayers,  her family is left to shoulder this mighty burden alone. While they have asked for nothing but our best wishes,  it feels only right we do everything we can for sure deserving family in their time of need. All funds will E donated directly to the family along with a beautiful sympathy card expressing our condolences.

While they have asked for nothing but our best wishes,  it feels only right we do everything we can for sure deserving family in their time of need. All funds will E donated directly to the family along with a beautiful sympathy card expressing our condolences.

story:
At 99designs, community means everything.

The Philippines is home to one of our most active and talented designer communities. The country’s 14,000 designers have played a pivotal role in the growth of our company and contributed to the success of countless small businesses around the world. 99designs would not be the same without their support, and, in this time of need, we would like to return the favor.

99designs will match your donation to the American Red Cross Typhoon Appeal, dollar for dollar, until we reach our goal.

Please join us and donate now.

The country’s 14,000 designers have played a pivotal role in the growth of our company and contributed to the success of countless small businesses around the world. 99designs would not be the same without their support, and, in this time of need, we would like to return the favor.99designs will match your donation to the American Red Cross Typhoon Appeal, dollar for dollar, until we reach our goal.Please join us and donate now.

story:
About Us

We are an Arizona foster family. We currently have two foster children in our house. This is our second round of being a foster family. We really enjoy helping these children get into a stable environment with structure and caring.

UPDATED: Until a foster family has been licensed by the state, there is little finacial support to help with the additional expenses. The licensing process is lengthy, involving FBI background checks, education classes, home studies and many other strict guidelines that must be met. We are currently working toward this, however, up to this point we have not been paid as a licensed foster family. The reimbursement for unlicensed families is only pennies per day for each child. We have only been receiving about $15 per month per child.

Anyone that has children will know that this does not even start to cover the expenses of raising a child without special needs. This does not even consider that foster children often need therapy, as our children do, plus the added cost of many doctors appointments, day care, new school supplies and clothes. Most times children arrive to a foster family with only the outift they are currently wearing.

UPDATED: Our current A/C unit has needed repair five times already this summer. It has stopped work three days this week alone. Our hope is to get a new unit installed prior to this one failing completely. Our current system is at least 15 years old. The furnace blower barely pushes the air around the house. You can see in the photo how old and rusty our current unit is.

UPDATE: Check the gallery for scans of an actual check from the state.

What We Need

We have quotes from a reputable local installer for various system options. If we can reach our goal we will be able to get a new A/C and furnace along with new ductwork to areas of the house that do not already have climate controled air. These new areas will be used as bedrooms to provide for more children.

We also have quotes for options to only replace the A/C unit. If we do not reach the full goal we will use the money that we do get to replace as much as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you are not able to provide finacially. We appreciate that you read down to this point. You can still help by passing a link to this page on to all of your friends and family. Facebook, twitter and email are great ways to pass information along. Our direct link is www.indiegogo.com/foster-ac

Thank you for your time and any help you can provide.

story:
Our Story

About a year and a half ago, roughly seventy people assembled in a room with a mission to make positive changes in HawaiÊ»i’s food system.  We all cared about different parts of the food system.  When we met together for the first time, some of us cared about organic farming and fresh produce. Some of us cared about worm composting and sustainable packaging. Some of us that had been working on things like nutrition education and farm-to-school programs for years. Some of us were foodies. Some of us were chefs.  And we all have been on a mission to engage communities and ignite change across Hawaii's food system through education, analysis, and project facilitation.

Like a planted seed, we have changed shape as an organization and continue to grow all the time.  We have a strong root system with volunteer leaders.  We have a beautiful climate of welcoming community and supportive networks.  We have soil rich with ideas and projects.  But we need some help with a vital element: waiwai, or 'water-water', is translated in Hawaiian as 'wealth'.  

The Impact

The future of HawaiÊ»i’ depends on diverse stakeholders in the food system - from garden to garbage - thinking about how actions of one sector affect others.  Some of the biggest problems in our government, offices, and even homes have been a result of 'problem-solving in silos'.  Our goal is to bring together those diverse stakeholders to create a sustainable, systematic, effective, and inclusive change. To do this, we need your help.  

Right now, we are at a pivotal point our development as a council. Rather than go for project-dependent grant funding, we have decided that the best way to raise money is to do what we all know and love best: hang out with you!  

What We Need & What You Get

We came up with fundraising ideas that span budgets and interests of all kinds, because these are things we want to learn and do with you, from watching movies to taking cooking classes.  We imagine goodies like boxes of fresh veggies, gift certificates for good eats, and tickets to cool events that folks like us might like, too.  Why? Because we also want to choose things that help the food system along the way. We also thought you would be the type that would appreciate it. By the way, did we mention how much we like your type? 'Cus we do.

What will this wealth you pass on to us be used for? Specifically, we are working on action plans to make sure we understand the food system as it currently exists by creating a food map of HawaiÊ»i.  It’s like building a Google map for food. We need to understand the places, people, policies, pathways, and processes as well as all the gaps in between. Creating a food map is not a new idea. Other food policy councils have done similar work, and it takes lots of time, coordination, and organization.Those things aren’t free. One of our goals is to hire a project manager and make sure we finish a map that will be an invaluable resource for all of HawaiÊ»i’s people, from small business owners to senators and everyone in between.  

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us get the word out about our fundraiser by using the 'share' tools.  Join our listserve, friend us on Facebook, and follow us on Twitter to get updates about how our fundraising is going.  Mahalo!

story:
As a kid I would have never thought that one day I would be in the position that I am now. I was the skinny kid that people overlooked, that no one thought was special, and I never would have believed if someone had told me that I could model. 

That is why I am so shocked and surprised to be in the position that I am now. I have the opportunity to shoot with some of the biggest photographers in the country. However the cost of traveling is extremely high. Through this campaign I hope to acquire the funds needed to participate in these shoots, and take my career as a physique model to the next level. Thank you for even taking the time to review this campaign and God Bless.

That is why I am so shocked and surprised to be in the position that I am now. I have the opportunity to shoot with some of the biggest photographers in the country. However the cost of traveling is extremely high. Through this campaign I hope to acquire the funds needed to participate in these shoots, and take my career as a physique model to the next level. Thank you for even taking the time to review this campaign and God Bless.

story:
Who we are

The Two Row Times is an exciting newspaper coming out of the Six Nations of the Grand River Territory – the largest Onkwehon:we (indigenous) community within Canada.

The Newspaper and the Website both Launched in August of 2013, the paper is led by its founder Jonathan Garlow. Jonathan is of Mohawk and Pottawotami descent and is a musician, beats-producer, writer, and printer by trade.

Jon and his team are trying to do something different with this paper. We're trying to provide a media vehicle to not only express Onkwehon:we news and concerns coming from Six Nations, but to reach out with a mass circulation free weekly newspaper (23,000 copies a week) that can speak to and bring together a wide variety of native and non-native communities together.

Joining forces with Jon is his cousin Benjamin Doolittle, the Two Row Times website manager, who owns an independent Onkwehon:we web design company, With Benjamin's direct support the website presence has been launched into the forefront of all competing markets. 

The Two Row Wampum – the original agreement between Onkwehon:we people and the new arrivals on this continent – is our guiding light and affects everything that we do with our paper. Like the Two Row, the staff at our paper pledge to keep everything we do consistent with the principles of the Two Row Wampum and the Kaianerekowa – "the great peace" – a philosophical and constitutional framework that provides the basis of Haudenosaunee Confederacy and the Onkwehon:we way of life.

Why you should care

The Two Row Times provides a unique Onkwehon:we news source that can unify and uplift all people. We believe that a coming together of native and non-native people to express our common interests in healing the earth, honouring diversity and creating respectful and dignified conditions of life for all is the only way to ensure our continued survival as human beings.

It has been increasingly apparent since the rise of the Idle No More movement that indigenous people in Turtle Island are in resurgence. The Anishinabe prophecies of the 7th and 8th fires are upon us and the choices we need to take are apparant. But we need more than protests. We need to develop the media institutions that can reflect and express the interests of Onkwehon:we people and to unify with all who want to stop harming and start healing mother Earth.

Indigenous people on Turtle Island aren't exactly overflowing with cash. But we believe that the time has come for a publication like the Two Row Times. If everyone even donates a small amount, we can build our media together. With your help we can raise the funds that will make it possible for us to grow and flourish.

The Impact

Your contribution will make it possible for us to keep bringing you news and opinions from the front lines of Onkwehon:we existence on this land. We will be using the money you donate to hire Onkwehon:we journalists and correspondents, employ the distributors that keep more than 500 pickup locations stocked with papers, and to of course print the paper and keep our office running.

If you've never seen our paper before, you can check out all our back issues here. It is worth stressing that this is a unique media project.

Due to the history of colonization and oppression that Onkwehon:we people have faced, we don't have much in the way of media that reaches beyond the reserve.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't like the idea of donating online, you can still send us a check, money order, or come by with cash to our office at 657 Mohawk Road, Six Nations Territory, ON, N0A 1H0. 

Main office: 1(519) 900-5535

Editorial: 1(519) 900-6241

Advertising: 1(519) 900-5535

like our page fb.com/tworowtimes, & follow us @tworowtimes

NOTE: Thanks to A Tribe Called Red for use of their track from their latest album Nation II Nation. For more powerful electric pow wow music, check their website: www.atribecalledred.com
