story:
What is Mapability

Mapability is a crowd-sourced social initiative creating overlays to online maps that provide accessibility data for cities.

Mapability maps helps end users find the most accessible paths for wheelchair access, mothers with strollers, elderly, kid-safe areas, baby-care facilities, and much more.

The crowd-sourced data-acquisition comes from the members of multiple active volunteer communities and other individuals who contribute by uploading geo-localized photos and accessibility parameters using a simple online UI app.

Development unitl now has been done on a volunteer level, and more than 15 cities already have volunteers collecting data. We now need to finish up development and especially develop the mobile application.

What do we need all that money for?

We need the money the develop an awesome, cross platform mobile application that will help users find and mark accessible places and streets on the map. The application and maps will be available WORLDWIDE, in every city! We cannot do it by ourselves!

We are a not for profit association and our maps will always be free. 

The map

The Map shows accessibility based on street colors: the colors derive from more than 90 parameters being computed, such as:

- surface type

- street quality

- slope

- presence of barriers / obstacles

- width (for wheelchair users)

- many more!


Augmented Reality through Layar Browser


Mapability integrates the first augmented reality application for accessibility in the world using the Layar Browser. Every data collected can be inserted into Layar Browser for augmented reality navigation. 

What We Need 

We need to develop the mobile app to insert data. Right now you can insert data only from the desktop application, we want a native mobile app that allows users to insert data immediately. This is not easy because the application needs to:

- allow for photo re-positioning through a map

- associate more than 90 parameters to a photo

- send photo to database

What you get

SUPPORT YOUR OWN STREET PERKS

You can become the supported of your own street! Your name or website will appear on the street information in the map!

You can purchase this for only $ 30 (or $ 200 for full package). Hurry up! Your street deserves your support!

Moreover, what you get is the chance to take part in the biggest accessibility initiative in the world:

  • You can become part of our association, you will receive our memebership card and you will be able to vote on further development of the initiative. 
  • You can support mapping for your own street. If you donate $ 50,00 you will have your name among the donors of the street you select. Also you will receive our T-shirt!
  • You can help us create a useful service and allow users to use it for free. 
Hundreds of volunteers in Europe are already helping us, join us and help us spread all over the world by developing a mobile application.
 
Donate and obtain a full year membership card or life membership: members can vote on key decisions and propose solutions. Votations and discussions are online on every key issue regarding the association. You receive voting notification by email.
 

 Mapability Polo Shirt

The Impact

We have developed a method for mapping street accessibility based on precise parameters. No one else is doing this for streets. Our methodology relies on more than 90 parameters that altogether determine accessibility for various users: wheelchair users, but also mothers with strollers, elderly, children and also blind users via speech synthesis. 

We have already mapped many cities in Europe through our volunteer networks, you can join them on teams.mapability.org 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can join our Teams Website and create your own Mapability Team to find accessibile streets

 

Our Volunteers

Our volunteer team in Rome, Italy:

Team formation for a volunteer group

 

 

MAP FEATURES

Find out all the map features in this video:

 http://youtu.be/T_olh134Dq0

 

Publication on the Eurisy Magazine:

 

Find out more on www.mapability.org

story:
Short Summary

My name is Michael Consbruck.  My business partner and I are opening up V wine tasting room.  We have rented the original library in West Hollywood, California and plan to transform the now delapidated space back into a glorious 1930's library - a throw back to its heritage.  The space is currently listed on the historic registery, but it needs work! 

I am a landscape architect by day with a passion for boutique wines, and sharing my experience and knowledge of wine.  I learn more every day, and love to explore good wines with friends, family and new guests.  The boutique wines represented at V are all made by small winemakers that do not have other representation.  By helping us fulfill our dreams of a wine tasting and education room, we help the winemakers fulfill their dreams of making and selling great wines.

We are in construction, but ran into significant structural issues that had to be corrected for the safety of our guests and the integrity of the building.  We have experienced a construction budget grow by 200% and we need help to finish construction and bring in our inventory.  This process has taken almost an entire year of permits, hearings, more permits and numerous hurdles thrown at us by the city.  We have successuflly won everyone over, designed an amazing space but have been paying rent this entire time and have come to the end of our initial funding.  We need your help to finish our project and finally open our doors to friends, the community, guests and all the new friends we will make along the way!


All of the contributions will go directly to construction expenses and to purchase furniture and inventory.  We have a goal to be open by mid January and with all of your help we will be able to achieve this goal. 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for $15,000, all of which will be used directly for construction and inventory.  We have paid for and corrected all of the structural issues plaguing the building inflicted by previous tenants and years of neglect, and are now ready to do all the cosmetic changes transforming the space from an open room to a 1930's library with custom built book cases, a tasting bar that looks like a check out desk, detail, trim and images evoking a warm and inviting feel. 

People will use a renovated card catalog to find the location of different wines, books on wine and different gifts and merchandise located through out the book shelves and tables in the space.  Each guest will have a library card, which will allow us to personalize their experience and cator to their specific tastes. 

Our goal is $15,000, but any little bit helps!  We will be greatful for any contribution given to our dream, with any additional money raised above $15,000 to be used for the first months operating expenses and rent. 

The Impact

Our project is unique as it will be the only tasting room in West Hollywood.  Additionally it will be the first tasting room in southern California that provides the guests with wine education and information on all the winemakers we represent.  We will provide a unique space for neighbors and guests to experience unique wines that cannot be found at any other retail venue in all of Southern California. 

All contributions not only help us open and realize our dream, but it also helps small the small winemakers we represent.  None of these boutique winemakers use a national or regional brokerage to sell their product, relying on sales our of their own tasting rooms, local sales in their home town and region and the success of V.  We are proud to be a small business helping and promoting other small businesses. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Any contribution you can make will have a big impact on our project and dream, not to mention the dream of many other boutique winemakers.  If you are not able to make a contribution, spreading the word is just as good to other people who might want to contribute.  Any amout of help or word of mouth is very appreciated!

story:
Blu Nynja Dogs will be at Yelm and Tumwater Farmers Market!

Meet Blu and Gynger, the foremothers of Blu Nynja Dogs; a big idea turned small business venture. The unification of the Blu/Gynger team is pretty spectacular. Blu is a bold, well-traveled, fusion chef with an entrepreneurial spirit. Gynger is a charismatic, accomplished professional, whose drive to succeed equals her drive to understand the answers to life's big questions. Basically, they are two down to earth and slightly crazy women, trying to pave their way into business ownership. The purpose of their business will be to provide Thurston County’s farmer’s markets and special events with exquisite coffee and locally produced hotdogs and sausages. To make these superior products, the gals need quality equipment and other essential associated accoutrements.  This includes substantial items such as a shiny hotdog cart, two sparkly drip coffee makers and a worthy tent, and regulatory essentials such as permits, licenses and safely equipment.

Blu and Gynger will be grateful for donations used to kick-start their business. Donate and receive one of the fabulous perks listed on the right.  

HERE IS THE CART WE ARE RAISING FUNDS FOR, PRICE TAG $4,000

OUR DOGS,USING THE BEST QUALITY LOCAL INGREDIANTS THAT WE CAN SOURCE. WE WANT TO MAKE YOUR MARKET EXPERIENCE TASTY!


  Haiku:

blu nynja hot dogs

a hot mess on a sweet day

market folks enjoy!

story:
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

Visit us on www.Socialgiver.com to get exclusive deals from Thailand's top hotels, restaurants, and activities. The entire revenue you spend goes to support local charities that are making a real difference!



A LIFESTYLE WITH A SOCIAL TWIST

Socialgiver brings you hand-picked services from leading brands. Not only do these amazing brands give you exclusive rates, but they’ll give every dollar you spend toward creating impact and sustainability for causes you care about most.

For example, you can get amazing hotel deals for your next vacation and choose to have that money put underprivileged children through school!


HOW IT WORKS

Socialgiver is a ‘giving ecosystem’ where each partner gives something and gets something more valuable in return. We create a win-win-win solution:

For Consumers, Socialgiver offers a "Lifestyle with a Social Twist"
We bring you hand-picked products and services from leading brands at exclusive rates; such as hotels, restaurants and activities. Not only does Socialgiver give you the best rates, but every dollar you spend is put toward creating impact and sustainability for causes you care about most.

For Social Projects, Socialgiver gives "Access to Sustainable Funding"
Socialgiver commits 70% of the revenue generated through online sales to social projects. 30% helps pay our costs and attract more businesses. On top of just fundraising, we connect them with donors and fans, and assist them to achieve their social impact goals - helping them become more effective in using funds.

For Hospitality Businesses, Socialgiver helps "Create Shared Value"
We help businesses integrate the customer experience with the giving experience. By tapping into ‘spare service capacity’ of businesses (unfilled rooms, unserved seats, unsold tickets) that currently generate no value, Socialgiver helps businesses give back in a meaningful way while attracting new customers who will fall in love with their brand. We connect them with YOU, the customer, so you can give back together...

In this way, Socialgiver aims to boost the funding that's made available to the social sector by linking people, businesses and projects together in a unique way that creates 'shared value'. Tapping into unused resources and bridging the gap between consumer spending and charitable donations, we aim to revolutionise fundraising.








Socialgiver's role is to offer these businesses an alternative for their spare capacity - rather than an empty room, use it to put a child through school; rather than an unsold ticket, use it to save our fragile ecosystem.
 For a full list of giving partners click here.


PROJECTS WE SUPPORT


We currently support 12 projects in Thailand with a sustainable source of funding, so far raising over $30,000 in our test stage. Here are 3 examples of the social impacts of the funding through Socialgiver:

Love Wildlife Foundation is a wildlife conservation project, specialising in the protection and rehabilitation of the endangered slow lorises from illegal trafficking and habitat encroachment. Funding is ensuring a constant supply of medicines, important due to tooth infections from the clipping of the teeth by traffickers, and the employment of a part-time vet who comes to the center once a week.

The Swimsafe Sharks is a swimming and water survival education project in rural Thai schools. The child drowning rates in Thailand are alarming as there are little or no facilities to teach swimming in rural areas. Funding is helping to train 15 swimming and survival swimming instructors with the help of The Thai Life Saving Society and to purchase flotation devices. The funding is supporting work with 3 schools teaching 776 children.

Zy Movement Foundation supports children with disabilities, and empowers their families with knowledge, skill, and the mental willpower to raise their children to the highest potential. We support their Vojta therapy programme, which stimulates and rehabilitates the deep muscle systems of the spine and extremities, making a difference for these children throughout their entire life. The programme is currently training 24 therapists, who are expected to treat up to one thousand children each year.

Find out more about our other project partners here.


WHY SUPPORT SOCIALGIVER?

You can help us to achieve our goals of building a sustainable funding source for vulnerable communities by tapping into the spare service capacity of businesses to create a thriving 'giving ecosystem'. Every dollar you donate goes a long way to firstly help us raise more funds to support dozens of projects, and secondly, to ensure that they are making an even greater impact in the work that they do!


MEET OUR TEAM

Our team of 11 is a collection of diverse individuals with the common aim of contributing positively to society. This is what drives us to come to work each and every day to create something that we believe has genuine potential to create sustainable and scalable impact. Help us create a conscious consumer movement and scale our impact around the world!

We thank you for your support and hope to meet you on your next visit to Thailand!
Please help us spread the word!
